item.title: Israeli strike on south Gaza hospital kills senior Hamas official
item.description: A senior Hamas official was killed in an Israeli airstrike on a hospital in southern Gaza on Sunday, the group and the Israel Defense Forces said.

item.title: Supreme Court to hear Louisiana race and redistricting case
item.description: The justices are considering a dispute over how Louisiana's congressional districts were drawn after the 2020 census.
